scenario.name: Analysis Use Case - Performance Review
scenario.instruction: Analyze the performance of all Facebook campaigns from the last 30 days. Focus on CTR, ROAS, and conversion rates. Identify top performers and underperformers.
scenario.description: Pure analysis workflow - should route through monitor → analyze → optimize → report

scenario.name: Action Use Case - Campaign Creation
scenario.instruction: Create a new Facebook campaign for promoting eco-friendly water bottles to millennials aged 25-35. Budget should be $50 daily, objective is conversions, and run for 2 weeks starting tomorrow.
scenario.description: Pure action workflow - should route through intent → execute actions → report
